description: Machine-readable command definitions for AgentQMS. Extracted from legacy Makefile.

status.shell_cmd: echo 'üîç Checking Agent Tools Status...' && echo '' && echo 'üìÅ Tool Organization:' && ls -la ../tools/ | grep '^d' | grep -v '__pycache__' | awk '{print "  " $9}' && echo '' && echo 'üõ†Ô∏è Agent Wrapper Scripts:' && ls -la ../*.sh 2>/dev/null | awk '{print "  " $9}' || echo '  No wrapper scripts found' && echo '' && echo 'üìä Recent Activity:' && find ../../artifacts -name '*.md' -mtime -1 2>/dev/null | head -5 | awk '{print "  " $0}' || echo '  No recent artifacts'

validate.shell_cmd: python -m AgentQMS.tools.core.plugins --write-snapshot --json > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Plugin snapshot skipped (optional)' && uv run python $(CURDIR)/aqmsvalidate --all

plugins-snapshot.shell_cmd: python -m AgentQMS.tools.core.plugins --write-snapshot --json > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Plugin snapshot skipped (optional)'

check-links.description: Check Markdown links referring to artifacts

compliance.shell_cmd: python -m AgentQMS.tools.core.plugins --write-snapshot --json > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Plugin snapshot skipped (optional)' && aqmsmonitor --check

track-status.shell_cmd: uv run python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '../..'); from AgentQMS.tools.utilities.tracking.query import get_status; print(get_status('all'))"

context.description: Generate context bundle for task (requires TASK parameter)

tool-catalog.description: Generate tool catalog and scripts index

export.description: Export framework to project-agnostic package (requires OUTPUT parameter)

artifacts-status.description: Show artifact status dashboard with aging and lifecycle information

changelog-draft.description: Generate changelog draft from tracking DB and git log

ide-config.description: Generate/Update configuration files for all IDEs (Antigravity, Cursor, etc.)

clean.description: Clean up temporary files and caches
clean.shell_cmd: echo 'üßπ Cleaning up temporary files...' && find .. -name '*.pyc' -delete && find .. -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find .. -name '*.log' -delete && echo '‚úÖ Cleanup completed'

dev-setup.shell_cmd: echo 'üõ†Ô∏è Setting up development environment...' && cd ../.. && uv sync && echo '‚úÖ Development environment ready'

dev-test.shell_cmd: echo 'üß™ Testing agent tools...' && uv run python ../tools/core/discover.py && aqmsartifact --help && aqmsvalidate --help && aqmsmonitor --help && aqmsfeedback --help && aqmsquality --help && uv run python ../tools/documentation/auto_generate_index.py --help && echo '‚úÖ All tools tested successfully'

compliance-fix.reason: Use 'fix' for standard fixes or 'compliance-fix-ai' for AI fixes

audit-init.reason: Legacy audit framework - use assessments/design docs

audit-checklist-generate.reason: Legacy audit framework - track tasks in implementation plans

audit-checklist-report.reason: Legacy audit framework - use Project Compass or plans
